casename: Tan Chong Realty Pte Ltd v Victory Industrial Co Pte Ltd
counsel: Chia Foon Yeow (Tan Peng Chin & Partners) for the plaintiffs; Sarbjit Singh Chopra with Kelvin Fong Kai Tong (Lim & Lim) for the defendants

headings.text: Whether the plaintiffs were estopped from complaining of overloading
Whether the overloading caused the damage
Whether the plaintiffs quantification of the cost of rectification is justified
